description:
Launched on 11/08/2018 by a team based in the Republic of Korea, REBIT is a global platform that focuses on data-driven businesses with its proprietary input solution and artificial intelligence system. REBIT collects anonymized big data from users through its input solution and “Phoenix”, an AI system, which predicts customers’ intentions and patterns to optimize decision-making. 

REBIT's token economy consists of Keyboard Token (KEYT), Keyboard Point (KEYP), and Keyboard Cash (KEYC). KEYT is tradable in crypto exchanges. All members of the REBIT ecosystem can earn different currencies depending on the services that they use and contributions that they make. REBIT’s economic structure aims to incentivize the active participation of users while enabling growth through partnerships.
name: REBIT
